statements: UPDATE OceanTemperatureData SET temperature = 25.7 WHERE timestamp = '2022-08-15 10:30:00' AND location = 'Pacific Ocean';
UPDATE OceanTemperatureData SET location = 'Atlantic Ocean', temperature = 28.3 WHERE location = 'Indian Ocean' AND timestamp = '2022-08-16 08:45:00';
